CrowdSecAPIUrl.description: Define the URL to your CrowdSec LAPI server, default to `http://localhost:8080`.

CrowdSecAPIKey.description: CrowdSec Bouncer Key. Key generated by the cscli (CrowdSec cli) command like `cscli bouncers add bouncer-mediawiki`

CrowdSecCache.description: CrowdSec's cache config. Default to `true` for performance

CrowdSecFallbackBan.description: If enabled, When LAPI throws error, It ban the user. Default to false.

CrowdSecTreatCaptchaAsBan.description: Extension currently doesn't not challenge the user when captcha decision. Use this when your wiki experiencing extream spams. Default to `false`.

CrowdSecRestrictRead.description: If enabled, IP who blocked doesn't read the wiki at all too. Not recommended to enable this. Default to `false`
